description:
The gathered circus folk gasp and take a step back, apart from the Master.
'Ah' he muses, 'a wolfman'.
We haven't got one of those.
You stare at him in amazument; this is not the reaction you would have expected.
'We all have our secrets, do we not?' the Master says, givig you a wicked grin.
'But I think we might have a place for you, within our Carnivale — that is, if you would like to join us.
